author: lmeadors
msg: Added support for adding hbm files to configuration

author: lmeadors
msg: Added type aliases for other transaction managers

author: henning
msg: Stuff that is in 1.4.x JDK but not in 1.3.x commented out. You must
comment this in to build on 1.3.x JDK. This removes our dependency on
Sun downloaded JDBC and JNDI (which both are part of the 1.4+ JDK).

author: andreas
msg: Introduced Validator service. The JingValidator is based on Cocoon's JingTransformer (validation block) and allows to use protocols in Relax NG includes. This way, we can use fallback:// to resolve core schemas.
